name: CbcLinked
brief: Extended solver for nonlinear and bilinear problems

algorithms.name:
Bilinear Term Linearization (4-Lambda SOS2)
Copyright (C) 2006, IBM Corporation and others. All Rights Reserved.
This code is licensed under the terms of the Eclipse Public License (EPL).

This file contains classes for handling nonlinear/bilinear optimization:

OsiSolverLink: Extended OsiSolver that handles coefficient updates.
- Nonlinear SLP (Successive Linear Programming)
- Quadratic objective linearization
- Bilinear term handling via lambda formulations

OsiLinkedBound: Tracks bounds that depend on other bounds.
- Coefficient updates when bounds change
- Used for McCormick-style relaxations

OsiBiLinear: Represents x*y bilinear terms.
- Constructs 4-lambda SOS2 formulation
- Handles mesh refinement for tighter bounds
- Supports branching on either x or y

OsiLink/OsiOldLink: Linked ordered sets for structured problems.
- Models y and x*f(y) relationships
- SOS-style branching with linked variables

CbcHeuristicDynamic3: Heuristic for picking up feasible solutions.
CglTemporary: Temporary cut storage (destroyed after first use).
OsiSolverLinearizedQuadratic: Solver with linearized quadratic objective.
